# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Security fixes are provided for the latest published minor release line.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues privately using GitHub Security Advisories:

- https://github.com/lhozdroid/vanilla-tables/security/advisories/new

Please avoid opening public issues for vulnerabilities.

When possible, include:

- A clear description of the issue.
- Reproduction steps or proof of concept.
- Potential impact.

We will acknowledge reports and provide status updates as triage progresses.
